metadata.Title: CVE-2021-27097 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
The boot loader in Das U-Boot before 2021.04-rc2 mishandles a modified FIT.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-27097` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

u-boot - 2021.07+dfsg-0ubuntu2
u-boot-amlogic - 2021.07+dfsg-0ubuntu2
u-boot-exynos - 2021.07+dfsg-0ubuntu2
u-boot-imx - 2021.07+dfsg-0ubuntu2
u-boot-mvebu - 2021.07+dfsg-0ubuntu2
u-boot-omap - 2021.07+dfsg-0ubuntu2
u-boot-qcom - 2021.07+dfsg-0ubuntu2
u-boot-qemu - 2021.07+dfsg-0ubuntu2
u-boot-rockchip - 2021.07+dfsg-0ubuntu2
u-boot-rpi - 2021.07+dfsg-0ubuntu2
u-boot-sifive - 2021.07+dfsg-0ubuntu2
u-boot-sunxi - 2021.07+dfsg-0ubuntu2
u-boot-tegra - 2021.07+dfsg-0ubuntu2
u-boot-tools - 2021.07+dfsg-0ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: u-boot package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2021.07+dfsg-0ubuntu2').
